scripts.installwebpack: npm install --save-dev webpack webpack-cli html-webpack-plugin style-loader css-loader html-loader webpack-dev-server webpack-merge
scripts.installprettier:
npm install --save-dev --save-exact prettier && node --eval "fs.writeFileSync('.prettierrc','{
"useTabs":true
}
')" && node --eval "fs.writeFileSync('.prettierignore','# Ignore artifacts:
build
coverage
')"
scripts.installjest: npm install --save-dev jest babel-jest @babel/core @babel/preset-env && jest --watch src
scripts.fullsetup: npm run installwebpack && npm run installeslint && npm run installprettier && npm run eslintconfigprettier && npm run installjest
scripts.deploy: git subtree push --prefix dist origin gh-pages
